duties_responsibilities.duty: Review sales proposals, estimates, and customer plans to establish project requirements and support the project design process.
Select and size main system components such as pumps, valves, and meters for water treatment equipment.
Provide process reviews, system troubleshooting support, and customer communication, including corrective action with oversight.
Review and approve Process and Instrumentation Diagrams and General Arrangement Drawings.
Perform engineering calculations as required and ensure manufactured equipment conforms to project requirements.
Assist Purchasing with the qualification process for new suppliers and aid in the development of new standard product offerings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science degree in engineering related field preferred.
